About.title: Who I Am
About.description: Experienced Senior C# Developer with over 8 years of expertise in API development, DevOps, and delivering solutions serving millions of users. Currently working at 9292, leading and contributing to high-impact projects.
About.description2: My unique skills bridge backend and frontend teams, ensuring seamless communication and user-centric solutions. I excel at solving deep-rooted IT problems, analyzing complex bugs, and providing creative solutions. With a strong foundation in Azure, automated pipelines, and microservices, I strive to deliver efficient, scalable, and innovative systems.
strengths: API design, versioning and long-term evolution
CI/CD and safe, automated release workflows

Work.title: My Work
Work.role_9292: Senior Software Engineer & Team Lead at 9292
Work.desc_9292: Specialising in modern .NET 8 backend architecture, secure API design and high-performance distributed systems.
